descriptionHtml:
Okay, here is what I\'ve come up with. Hopefully, these convey the pain/pleasure in the human-werewolf transformations. 

Both male and female files are about 12 seconds long as I couldn\'t get a consensus on how long the actual transformation sequence is between the stock game and mods like \"Tales of Lycanthropy\". If either file is too long to sync up with the transformation sequence in game, the first 4-5 seconds of the file can be chopped off without too much loss in quality I guess...

As always, I would recommend that everyone listen to them prior to copying them to your Skyrim folder. If you have any suggestions feel free to post them here.
If you want to chop them up and modify them, HAVE-A-BALL!!! 
All that I ask is that you try to share your improvements with the rest of the community.

Installation Instructions:
Copy the \"Sound\" folder in the zip-file to your \"Skyrim/Data/\" folder. It should ask you to overwrite the current files. Click yes if you wish to proceed. After that, you should be finished. Everytime you transform, you will hear the new sounds instead of the old.

Thanks!
author: Detman101

files.name: Alternate - Female Werewolf Transformation Sound Replacer
files.fileName: Alternate - Female Werewolf Transformation Sound Replacer-20310-1-5.zip
files.changelogHtml: Created and uploade \"Alternate\" version of the \"Female Werewolf\" file as requested.
